topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e64772636872176f370700#post_54e64772636872176f370700
I think I'm going to pick up the Tokyo Ghoul Manga, I really enjoy the Anime but at this point and rate episodes get released I'll be far behind! 

Plus I am really getting into the show and just want to continue it with no weekly waiting!

So what are you reading it on?
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e64cb26368720bbb741400#post_54e64cb26368720bbb741400
"I'm using Batoto":http://bato.to/comic/_/comics/tokyo-ghoul-r3056
The Twisted-Hel scans are the best.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
So I'm skimming through the manga trying to fined where I was in the anime and continue from there and I _already_ see why people say the Manga is better than the anime.

From what I can tell the Anime is one of those anime's that kind of skips through things.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

Welp! Time to get to work!
